1: Losing a game is heartbreaking. Losing your sense of excellence is a tragedy.
2: Before you can win a game, you have to not lose it.
3: I have changed nothing, my style of play is still that of a child.
4: An old advice: you can't lose a game if you don't play the game.
5: Wanting something does not give you the right to have it.
6: If you wish to defeat me, train for another 100, 200, 400, 800 years.
